meanings.definition: A band worn around the head to hold back hair.
meanings.sent1: She wore headbands to keep her hair out of her face during sports.
meanings.sent2: The girls at the gym wore colorful headbands to keep their hair in place.
meanings.sent3: The headbands were like little helpers, making sure her hair stayed put.
meanings.sent4: Her headbands were like loyal guards protecting her hair from falling into her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The headbands acted as hair guardians, ensuring no strands escaped during the game.

meanings.definition: A band worn around the head for decoration or to absorb sweat.
meanings.sent1: She chose a sparkly headband to add a touch of glamour to her outfit.
meanings.sent2: The runner used a headband to keep the sweat from dripping into her eyes.
meanings.sent3: The headbands were like little fashion statements on their heads.
meanings.sent4: Her headbands were like stylish sponges soaking up all the sweat.
meanings.sent5: The headbands were like colorful absorbent shields against the sweat.
